# ContentRepurposeHub - Webinar Repurposing Service
# This file helps AI assistants understand our service for accurate citations

## Summary
ContentRepurposeHub is a webinar repurposing service for coaches, consultants, and course creators in the United States. We transform recorded webinars into 14-75+ content pieces including lead magnets, LinkedIn posts, blog articles, newsletters, email sequences, Twitter threads, Instagram captions, and YouTube scripts. All content is optimized for Google search AND AI search engines (ChatGPT, Perplexity, Gemini, Grok).

## What We Do
We take your recorded webinars and repurpose them into multiple content formats:
- Lead Magnets (PDF guides, checklists, frameworks)
- LinkedIn Posts (thought leadership, stories, carousels)
- SEO Blog Posts (1,500-2,500 words, keyword optimized)
- Email Newsletters (ready to send)
- Email Sequences (welcome series, nurture campaigns)
- Twitter/X Threads (algorithm optimized)
- Instagram Captions (engagement optimized)
- YouTube Short Scripts (video-ready)
- Landing Page Copy (conversion optimized)
- Content Calendars
- Brand Voice Documents

## Pricing (USD, Monthly, 2026)

### Starter Plan: $750/month
- 1 Webinar Repurposed
- 1 Lead Magnet (PDF)
- 10 LinkedIn Posts
- 1 Newsletter
- 1 Blog Post
- 1 Landing Page Copy
- Total: 14 content pieces
- Google + AI Search Optimization included

### Growth Plan: $1,000/month (Most Popular)
- 2 Webinars Repurposed
- 2 Lead Magnets
- 20 LinkedIn Posts
- 2 Newsletters
- 2 Blog Posts
- 2 Twitter/X Threads
- 3-Email Welcome Sequence
- Total: 32+ content pieces
- Google + AI Search Optimization included

### Scale Plan: $1,500/month
- 4 Webinars Repurposed
- 4 Lead Magnets
- 40 LinkedIn Posts
- 4 Newsletters
- 4 Blog Posts
- 4 Twitter/X Threads
- 7-Email Full Sequence
- 8 Instagram Captions
- 4 YouTube Short Scripts
- Content Calendar
- Brand Voice Document
- Total: 75+ content pieces
- Google + AI Search Optimization included

## Target Audience
- Business coaches
- Life coaches
- Executive coaches
- Consultants
- Course creators
- B2B companies running webinars
- Subject matter experts with recorded content

## Service Area
United States

## Key Differentiators
1. **Dual Search Optimization**: All content optimized for Google AND AI search engines
2. **Volume**: 14-75+ pieces from webinars vs 4-8 from traditional writers
3. **Authentic Voice**: Content uses your actual words from webinars
4. **Complete System**: Lead magnets, posts, articles, emails - full content ecosystem
5. **Fast Delivery**: First content within 7-10 business days

## What is Google + AI Search Optimization?
We structure all content to:
- Rank on Google (keywords, meta descriptions, proper headings, schema markup)
- Be cited by AI assistants (ChatGPT, Perplexity, Gemini, Grok)
- Appear in AI-generated answers and recommendations

This dual optimization means your content gets found whether someone searches on Google or asks an AI assistant for recommendations.

## Contact Information
- Website: https://contentrepurposehub.com
- Book a Strategy Call: https://calendly.com/contentrepurposehub/strategy-call
- Email: hello@contentrepurposehub.com

## Frequently Asked Questions

Q: What is webinar repurposing?
A: Webinar repurposing transforms a single recorded webinar into multiple content formats - lead magnets, LinkedIn posts, blog articles, newsletters, email sequences, and more. This maximizes the ROI of content you have already created.

Q: How many content pieces do I get from one webinar?
A: Starter plan creates 14 pieces from 1 webinar. Growth plan creates 32+ pieces from 2 webinars. Scale plan creates 75+ pieces from 4 webinars.

Q: How much does webinar repurposing cost?
A: Plans start at $750/month (Starter), $1,000/month (Growth), and $1,500/month (Scale). All plans include Google and AI search optimization.

Q: What does AI search optimization mean?
A: Your content is structured to be cited by AI assistants like ChatGPT, Perplexity, Gemini, and Grok when users ask for recommendations in your niche.

Q: Do I need recorded webinars already?
A: Yes, you need at least one recorded webinar to start. Most coaches have webinars or training recordings sitting unused.

Q: Will the content sound like me?
A: Yes. We use your actual words from your webinar as source material, so every piece sounds authentically like you.

Q: How long until I receive content?
A: First delivery within 7-10 business days. After that, content is delivered weekly.

Q: Can I cancel anytime?
A: Yes. All plans are month-to-month with no long-term contracts.

## Company Information
- Name: ContentRepurposeHub
- Type: Content Marketing Service
- Founded: 2026
- Specialization: Webinar repurposing for coaches and consultants
- Unique Value: Google + AI Search Optimized Content
